GE07bhg4c05u:2: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi /
GE07bhg4c05u:3: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam //1//
GE07bhg4c05u:6: jitendriyasya ca yateḥ pañcame muktim abravīt //
GE07bhg4c05u:7: ajñāna-sambhūtaṃ saṃśayaṃ jñānāsinā chittvā karma-yogam ātiṣṭha ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c05u:8: tatra pūrvāpara-virodhaṃ manvāno 'rjuna uvāca saṃnyāsam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:9: yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādinā sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha ity ādinā ca karma-saṃnyāsaṃ kathayasi /
GE07bhg4c05u:10: jñānāsinā saṃśayaṃ chittvā yogam ātiṣṭha iti punar yogaṃ ca kathayasi /
GE07bhg4c05u:11: na ca karma-saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ viruddha-svarūpatvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:12: tasmād etayor madhya ekasminn anuṣṭhātavye sati mama yac chreyaḥ suniścitam tad ekaṃ brūhi //1//
GE07bhg4c05u:16: tṛtīye 'dhyāye jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te ity ādinārjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavān jñāna-karmaṇor
GE07bhg4c05u:18: proktā mayānagha ity ādinā nirṇayaṃ kṛtavān /
GE07bhg4c05u:19: tathā cājñādhikārikaṃ karma na jñānena saha samuccīyate tejas-timirayor iva yugapad asambhavāt karmādhikāra-hetu-bheda-buddhy-apanodakatvena jñānasya tad-virodhitvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:21: jñāna-kāryasyājñāna-nāśasya karmaṇā kartum aśakyatvāt tam eva viditvāpi mṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'nāyanāya iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:22: jñāne jāte tu karma-kāryaṃ nāpekṣyata evety uktaṃ yāvān artha udapāne ity atra /
GE07bhg4c05u:23: tathā ca jñāninaḥ karmānadhikāre niścite prārabdha-karma-vaśād vṛthā-ceṣṭā-rūpeṇa tad-anuṣṭhānaṃ vā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso veti nirvivādaṃ caturthe nirṇītam /
GE07bhg4c05u:24: ajñena tv antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhi-dvārā jñānotpattaye karmāṇy anuṣṭheyāni tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:25: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate iti bhagavad-vacanāc ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:27: tathā sarva-karma-saṃnyāso 'pi jñānārthaḥ śrūyate etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:28: śānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet,
GE07bhg4c05u:29: tyajataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ tyuktuḥ pratyak paraṃ padam,
GE07bhg4c05u:31: vedān imaṃ lokam amuṃ ca parityajyātmānam anvicchet ity ādau /
GE07bhg4c05u:32: tatra karma tat-tyāgayor ārād upakāraka-saṃnipatyopakārakayoḥ prayājāvaghātayor iva na samuccayaḥ sambhavati viruddhatvena yaugapadyābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:33: nāpi karma-tat-tyāgayor ātma-jñāna-mātra-phalatvenaikārthatvād atirātrayoḥ ṣoḍaśi-grahaṇāgrahaṇayor iva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:35: karmaṇo hi pāpa-kṣaya-rūpam adṛṣṭam eva dvāraṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:36: saṃnyāsasya tu sarva-vikṣepābhāvena vicārāvasara-dāna-rūpaṃ dṛṣṭam eva dvāram /
GE07bhg4c05u:37: niyamāpūrvaṃ tu dṛṣṭa-samavāyitvād avaghātādāv iva na prayojakam /
GE07bhg4c05u:38: tathā cādṛṣṭārtha-dṛṣṭārthayor ārād upakāraka-saṃnipātyopakārakayor eka-pradhānārthatve 'pi vikalpo nāsty eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:44: tasmād ādau bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhānād antaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhau tīvreṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:47: tathā coktam - na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:49: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:50: yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate // [Gītā 6.3] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:54: brahmāvāptyai tu tat-tyāga īpsantīti śruter balāt // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:56: kaṣāya-paṅktiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:57: kaṣāye karmabhiḥ pakve tato jñānaṃ pravartate // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:59: kaṣāyaṃ pācayitvā ca śreṇī-sthāneṣu ca triṣu /
GE07bhg4c05u:60: pravrajec ca paraṃ sthānaṃ pārivrājyam anuttamam //
GE07bhg4c05u:63: tam āsādya tu muktasya dṛṣṭārthasya vipaścitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:64: triṣv āśrameṣu ko nv artho bhavet paramābhīpsitaḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:67: tathā ca śrutiḥ - brahmacaryaṃ samāpya gṛhī bhaved gṛhād vanī bhūtvā pravrajed yadi
GE07bhg4c05u:68: vetarathā brahmacaryād eva pravrajed gṛhād vā vanād vā yad ahar eva virajet tad ahar eva pravrajet iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:70: tasyaiva viraktatā-daśāyāṃ saṃnyāsaḥ śravaṇādy-avasara-dānena jñānārthaṃ iti daśā-bhedenājñam adhikṛtyaiva karma-tat-tyāgau vyākhyātuṃ pañcama-ṣaṣṭhāv adhyāyāv ārabhyete /
GE07bhg4c05u:71: vidvat-saṃnyāsas tu jñāna-balād artha-siddha eveti sandehābhāvān na vicāryate /
GE07bhg4c05u:72: tatraikam eva jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati jñānārthatvena karma-tat-tyāgayor vigdhānāt tayoś
GE07bhg4c05u:73: ca viruddhayor yugapad anuṣṭhānāsambhavān mayā jijñāsunā kim idānīm anuṣṭheyam iti
GE07bhg4c05u:76: karmaṇāṃ yāvaj-jīvādi-śruti-vihitānāṃ nityānāṃ naimittikānāṃ ca saṃnyāsaṃ tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:77: jijñāsum ajñaṃ prati kathayasi veda-mukhena punas tad-viruddhaṃ yogaṃ ca karmānuṣṭhāna-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi /
GE07bhg4c05u:78: etam eva pravrājino lokam icchantaḥ pravrajanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:79: tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena ity ādi-vākya-dvayena -
GE07bhg4c05u:81: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvann āpnoti kilbiṣam // [Gītā 4.21]
GE07bhg4c05u:82: chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata iti gītā-vākya-dvayena vā /
GE07bhg4c05u:83: tatraikam ajñaṃ prati karma-tat-tyāgayor vidhānād yugapad ubhayānuṣṭhānasambhavād
GE07bhg4c05u:84: etayoḥ karma-tat-tyāgayor madhye yad ekaṃ śreyaḥ praśasyataraṃ manyase karma vā tat-tyāgaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:85: vā tan me brūhi suniścitaṃ tava matam anuṣṭhānāya //1 //
GE07bhg4c05u:87: proktaṃ jñānād api śreṣṭhaṃ karma tad-dāṛḍhya-siddhaye /
GE07bhg4c05u:88: tat-padārthasya ca jñānaṃ sāmyād yā api pañcame //
GE07bhg4c05u:89: pūrvādhyāyānte śrutena vākya-dvāreṇa virodham āśaṅkamānaḥ pṛcchati sannyāsam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:92: iti vākyena tvaṃ karma-yogenotpanna-jñānasya karma-saṃnyāsaṃ brūṣe /
GE07bhg4c05u:95: ity anena punas tasyaiva karma-yogaṃ ca brūṣe /
GE07bhg4c05u:96: na ca karma-saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś ca ekasyaiva ekadaiva sambhavataḥ,
GE07bhg4c05u:99: karma-yogaṃ vā kuryād iti tvad-abhiprāyam anavagato /
GE07bhg4c05u:100: haṃ pṛcchāmi etayor madhye yad ekaṃ śreyas tvayā suniścitam tan me brūhi //1//
GE07bhg4c05u:103: śuddhasya tad-akartṛtvaṃ tvety ādi prāha pañcame //
GE07bhg4c05u:104: dvitīye mumukṣuṃ praty ātma-vijñānaṃ mocakam abhidhāya tad-upāyayā niṣkāmaṃ karma kartavyam abhyadhāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:105: labdha-vijñānasya na kiṃcit karmāstīti yas tv ātma-ratir eva syāt iti tṛtīye,
GE07bhg4c05u:106: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha iti caturthe cāvādīt /
GE07bhg4c05u:107: ante tu tasmād ajñāna-saṃbhūtaṃ [Gītā 4.42] ity ādinā tasyaiva punaḥ karma-yogaṃ prāvocat /
GE07bhg4c05u:110: karmaṇāṃ sannyāsaṃ sarvendriya-vyāpāra-virati-rūpaṃ jñāna-yogam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:111: punar yogaṃ karmānuṣṭhānaṃ ca sarvendriya-vyāpāra-rūpaṃ śaṃsasi /
GE07bhg4c05u:114: tasmāl labdha-jñānaḥ karma sannyased anutiṣṭhed veti bhavad-abhimataṃ vettum aśakto 'haṃ pṛcchāmi /
GE07bhg4c05u:121: śrīdharaḥ : atrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:122: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na hi vedānta-vedyātma-tattvajñaṃ prati karma-yogam ahaṃ bravīmi /
GE07bhg4c05u:124: api tu dehātmābhimāninaṃ tvāṃ bandhu-vadhādi-nimitta-śoka-mohādi-kṛtam enaṃ saṃśayaṃ dehātma-viveka-jñānāsinā chittvā paramātma-jñānopāya-bhūtaṃ karma-yogam ātiṣṭheti bravīmi /
GE07bhg4c05u:125: karma-yogena śuddha-cittasyātma-tattva-jñāne jāte sati tat-paripākārthaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṅgatvena saṃnyāsaḥ pūrvam uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:126: evaṃ saty aṅga-pradhānayor vikalpa-yogāt saṃnyāsaḥ karma-yogaś cety etāv ubhāv api bhūmikā-bhedena samuccitāv eva niḥśreyasaṃ sādhayataḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:127: tathāpi tu tayor madhye tu karma-saṃnyāsāt sakāśāt karma-yogo viśiṣṭo bhavatīti //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:129: evam arjunasya praśne tad-uttaram śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:131: tayos tu karma-saṃnyāsād anadhikāri-kṛtāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate śreyān adhikāra-sampādakatvena //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:133: karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti jñāninaḥ karma-karaṇe na ko 'pi doṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:134: pratyuta niṣkāma-karmaṇā citta-śuddhi-dārḍhyāj jñāna-dārḍhyam eva syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:135: saṃnyāsinas tu kadācit citta-vaiguṇye sati tad-upaśamanārthaṃ kiṃ karma niṣiddham ?
GE07bhg4c05u:137: viṣaya-grahaṇe tu vāntāśitvam eva syād iti bhāvaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:138: baladevaḥ : evaṃ pṛṣṭo śrī-bhagavān uvāca saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:141: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ - na khalu labdha-jñānasyāpi karma-yogo doṣāvahaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:143: jñāna-niṣṭhatayā karma-sannyāsinas tu citta-doṣe sati tad-doṣa-vināśāya karmānuṣṭheyaṃ pratiṣedhaka-śāstrāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:144: karma-tyāga-vākyāni tv ātmani ratau satyāṃ karmāṇi taṃ svayaṃ tjayantīty āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:145: tasmāt sukaratvād apramādatvāj jñāna-garbhatvāc ca karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti //2//
GE07bhg4c05u:147: jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati /
GE07bhg4c05u:148: nirdvandvo hi mahā-bāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:149: śrīdharaḥ : kuta ity apekṣāyāṃ saṃnyāsitvena karma-yoginaṃ stuvaṃs tasya śreṣṭhatvaṃ darśayati jñeya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:150: rāga-dveṣādi-rāhityena parameśvarārthaṃ karmāṇi yo 'nutiṣṭhati sa nityaṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'pi saṃnyāsīty evaṃ jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:151: tatra hetuḥ nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣādi-dvandva-śūnyo hi śuddha-citto jñāna-dvārā sukham anāyāsenaiva bandhāt saṃsārāt pramucyate //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:153: tam eva karma-yogaṃ stauti jñeya iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:154: sa karmaṇi pravṛtto 'pi nityaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:155: ko 'sau ? yo na dveṣṭi bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā kriyamāṇaṃ karma niṣphalatva-śaṅkayā /
GE07bhg4c05u:157: nirdvandvo rāga-dveṣa-rahito hi yasmāt sukham anāyāsena he mahābāho bandhād antaḥkaraṇāśuddhi-rūpāj
GE07bhg4c05u:160: na ca sannyāsa-prāpyo mokṣo 'kṛta-saṃnyāsenaiva tena na prāpya iti vācyam ity āha jñeya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:161: sa tu śuddha-cittaḥ karmī nitya-saṃnyāsī eva jñeyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:162: he mahābāho iti mukti-nagarīṃ jetuṃ sa eva mahāvīra iti bhāvaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:163: baladevaḥ : kuto viśiṣyate tatrāha jñeya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:166: yaḥ karmāntargatātmānubhavānanda-paritṛptas tato 'nyat kiṃcit na kāṅkṣati na ca dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c05u:167: nirdvandvo dvandva-sahiṣṇuḥ sukham anāyāsena sukara-karma-niṣṭhayety arthaḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c05u:169: sāṃkhya-yogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:170: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam //4//
GE07bhg4c05u:171: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evam aṅga-pradhānatvenobhayor avasthā-bhedena krama-samuccayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:172: ato vikalpam aṅgīkṛtyobhayoḥ kaḥ śreṣṭha iti praśno 'jñāninām evocitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:173: na vivekinām ity āha sāṅkhya-yogāv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:175: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau eka-phalau santau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālā ajñā eva pravadanti na tu paṇḍitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:176: tatra hetuḥ - anayor ekam apy samyag āsthita āśritavān ubhayor api phalam āpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:177: tathā hi karma-yogaṃ samyag anutiṣṭhan śuddha-cittaḥ san jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindati /
GE07bhg4c05u:178: saṃnyāsaṃ samyag āsthito 'pi pūrvam anuṣṭhitasya karma-yogasyāpi paramparayā jñāna-dvārā yad ubhayoḥ phalaṃ kaivalyaṃ tad vindatīti na pṛthak phalatvam anayor ity arthaḥ //4//
GE07bhg4c05u:180: nanu yaḥ karmaṇi pravṛttaḥ sa kathaṃ saṃnyāsīti jñātavyaḥ karma-tat-tyāgayoḥ svarūpa-virodhāt phalaikyāt tatheti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c05u:182: tathā ca niḥśreyasa-karāv ubhāv ity anupapannam ity āśaṅkyāha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:183: saṃkhyā samyag ātma-buddhis tāṃ vahatīti jñānāntaraṅga-sādhanatayā sāṅkhyaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:185: tau pṛthag viruddha-phalau bālāḥ śāstrārtha-viveka-jñāna-śūnyāḥ pravadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:188: ucyate - ekam apy saṃnyāsa-karmaṇor madhye samyag āsthitaḥ svādhikārānurūpeṇa samyag
GE07bhg4c05u:189: yathā-śāstraṃ kṛtavān sann ubhayor vindate phalam jñānotpatti-dvāreṇa niḥśreyasam ekam eva //4 //
GE07bhg4c05u:191: tasmād yac chreya evaitayor iti tvad-uktam api vastuto na ghaṭate /
GE07bhg4c05u:192: vivekibhir ubhayoḥ pārthakyābhāvasya dṛṣṭatvād ity āha sāṃkhya-yogāv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:194: saṃnyāsa-karma-yogau pṛthak svatantrāv iti bālāḥ vadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:195: na tu vijñāḥ jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvokteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:197: baladevaḥ : yaḥ śreya etayor ekam iti tvad-vākyaṃ ca na ghaṭata ity āha sāṃkhyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:198: jñāna-yoga-karma-yogau phala-bhedāt pṛthag-bhūtāv iti bālāḥ pravadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:200: ataeva ekam ity ādi phalam ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇam //4//
GE07bhg4c05u:202: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:203: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:204: śrīdharaḥ : etad eva sphuṭayati yat sāṃkhyair iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:205: sāṃkhyair jñāna-niṣṭhaiḥ saṃnyāsibhir yat sthānaṃ mokṣākhyaṃ prakarṣeṇa sākṣād avāpyate,
GE07bhg4c05u:206: yogair ity ārśa āditvān matv-arthīyo 'c-pratyayo draṣṭavyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:207: tena karma-yogibhir api tad eva jñāna-dvāreṇa gamyate 'vāpyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:208: ataḥ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca ekaphalatvena ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:210: ekasyānuṣṭhānāt katham ubhayoḥ phalaṃ vindate tathāha yat sāṃkhyair iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:212: eva saṃskṛtāntaḥ-karaṇaiḥ śravaṇādi-pūrvikayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā yat prasiddhaṃ sthānaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:213: tiṣṭhaty evāsmin na tu kadāpi cyavata iti vyutpattyā mokṣākhyaṃ prāpyata āvaraṇābhāva-mātreṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:215: yogair api bhagavad-arpaṇa-buddhyā phalābhisandhi-rāhityena kṛtāni karmāṇi śāstrīyāṇi yogās te yeṣāṃ santi te 'pi yogāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:217: tair yogibhir api sattva-śuddhyā saṃhyāsa-pūrvaka-śravaṇādi-puraḥ-sarayā jñāna-niṣṭhayā vartamāne bhaviṣyati vā janmani sampatsyamānayā tat sthānaṃ gamyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:219: sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa eva samyak paśyati nānyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:220: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ yeṣāṃ saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena prāg-janmasu bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhānumīyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:222: yāny ato 'nyāni janmāni teṣu nūnaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavet /
GE07bhg4c05u:223: yat kṛtyaṃ puruṣeṇeha nānyathā brahmaṇi sthitiḥ // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:224: evaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavad-arpita-karma-niṣṭhā dṛśyate teṣāṃ tayaiva liṅgena bhāvinī saṃnyāsa-pūrvajñāna-niṣṭhānumīyate sāmagryāḥ kāryāvyabhicāritvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:225: tasmād ajñena mumukṣuṇāntaḥkaraṇa-śuddhaye prathamaṃ karma-yogo 'nuṣṭheyo na tu saṃnyāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:226: sa tu vairāgya-tīvratāyāṃ svayam eva bhaviṣyatīti //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:231: ataeva tad dvayaṃ pṛthag-bhūtam api yo vivekenaikam eva paśyati sa paśyati,
GE07bhg4c05u:237: ataeva tad dvayaṃ nivṛtti-pravṛtti-rūpatayā bhinna-rūpam api phalaikyād ekaṃ yaḥ paśyati vetti,
GE07bhg4c05u:238: sa paśyati sa cakṣuṣmān paṇḍita ity arthaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c05u:240: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:242: śrīdharaḥ : yadi karma-yogino 'py antataḥ saṃnyāsenaiva jñāna-nisṭhā tarhy ādita eva saṃnyāsaḥ kartuṃ yukta iti manvānaṃ praty āha saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:243: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā saṃnyāso duḥkham āptum duḥkha-hetuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:246: yoga-yuktas tu śuddha-cittatayā muniḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvācireṇaiva brahmādhigacchati /
GE07bhg4c05u:248: ataś citta-śuddheḥ prāk karma-yoga eva saṃnyāsād viśiṣyata iti pūrvoktaṃ siddham /
GE07bhg4c05u:253: aśuddhāntaḥkaraṇenāpi saṃnyāsa eva prathamaṃ kuto na kriyate jñāna-niṣṭhā-hetutvena tasyāvaśakatvād iti cet tatrāha saṃnyāsa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:254: ayogato yogam antaḥ-karaṇa-śodhakaṃ śāstrīyaṃ karmāntareṇa haṭhād eva yaḥ kṛtaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ sa tu duḥkham āptum eva bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:256: śodhake ca karmaṇy anadhikārāt karma-brahmobhaya-bhraṣṭatvena parama-saṅkaṭāpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:257: karma-yoga-yuktas tu śuddhāntaḥkaraṇatvān munir manana-śīlaḥ saṃnyāsī bhūtvā brahma
GE07bhg4c05u:258: satya-jñānādi-lakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ na cireṇa śīghram evādhigacchati sākṣātkaroti pratibandhakābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:261: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati // [Gītā 3.4] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:262: ata eka-phalatve 'pi karma-saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyata iti yat prāg uktaṃ tad upapannam //6//
GE07bhg4c05u:264: kintu samyak-citta-śuddhim anirdhārayato jñāninaḥ saṃnyāso duḥkhadaḥ karma-yogas tu sukhada eveti pūrva-vyañjitam arthaṃ spaṣṭam evāha saṃnyāsas tv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:266: ayogataḥ karma-yogābhāvāc citta-vaiguṇya-praśāmaka-karma-yogasya saṃnyāsiny abhāvāt tatra anadhikārād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:271: śrutir api -yadi na samuddharanti yatayo hṛdi kāma-jaṭā iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:272: bhagavatāpi yas tva saṃyata-ṣaḍ-vargaḥ [BhP 11.18.40] ity ādy uktam /
GE07bhg4c05u:273: tasmād yoga-yuktaḥ niṣkāma-karmavān munir jñānī san brahma śīghraṃ prāpnoti //6//
GE07bhg4c05u:274: baladevaḥ : jñāna-yogasya duṣkaratvāt sukara-karma-yogaḥ śreyān ity āha saṃnyāsas tv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:276: ayogataḥ karma-yogaṃ vinā duḥkhaṃ prāptum bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:277: duṣkaratvāt sapramādatvāc ca duḥkha-hetur eva syād ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:278: yoga-yukta-niṣkāma-karmī tu munir ātma-manana-śīlaḥ sann acireṇa śīghram eva brahmādhigacchati //6//
GE07bhg4c05u:282: śrīdharaḥ : karma-yogādi-krameṇa brahmādhigame saty api tad-uparitanena karmaṇā bandhaḥ syād evety āśaṅkyāha yoga-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:284: ataeva viśuddha ātmā cittaṃ yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:287: tataś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasya sa loka-saṅgrahārthaṃ svābhāvikaṃ vā karma kurvann api na lipyate //7//
GE07bhg4c05u:289: nanu karmaṇo bandha-hetutvād yoga-yukto munir brahmādhigacchatīty anupapannam ity ata āha yoga-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:291: tena yogena yuktaḥ puruṣaḥ prathamaṃ viśuddhātmā viśuddho rajas-tamo-bhyām akaluṣita ātmāntaḥkaraṇa-rūpaṃ sattvaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:296: yasyaite nityatā daṇḍāḥ sa tridaṇḍīti kathyata // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:298: etādṛśasya tattva-jñānam avaśyaṃ bhavatīty āha sarva-bhūtātma-bhūtātmā sarva-bhūta ātma-bhūtaś cātmā svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:299: jaḍājaḍātmakaṃ sarva ātma-mātraṃ paśyann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:300: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām ātma-bhūta ātmā yasyeti vyākhyāne tu sarva-bhūtātmety etāvataivārtah-lābhād ātma-bhūtety adhikaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:302: etādṛśaḥ paramārtha-darśī kurvann api karmāṇi para-dṛṣṭyā na lipyate taiḥ karmabhiḥ sva-dṛṣṭyā tad-abhāvād ity arthaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c05u:304: kṛtenāpi karmaṇā jñāninas tasya na lepa ity āha yogeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:305: yoga-yukto jñānī trividhaḥ - viśuddhātmā vijita-buddhir ekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:309: etādṛśe gṛhasthe tu sarve 'pi jīvā anurajyantīty āha sarveṣām api bhūtānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadībhūta ātmā deho yasya saḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c05u:310: baladevaḥ : īdṛśī mumukṣuḥ sarveṣāṃ preyān ity āha yogeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:315: ataeva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ jīvānām ātma-bhūtaḥ premāspadatām gata ātmā deho yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:316: na cātra pārtha-sārathinā sarvātmaikyam abhimatam - na tv evāham ity ādinā sarvātmanāṃ mitho bhedasya tenābhidhānāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:318: evambhūtaḥ kurvann api viviktātmānusandhānād anātmany ātmābhimānena na lipyate acireṇātmānam adhigacchati /
GE07bhg4c05u:321: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattva-vit /
GE07bhg4c05u:322: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan //8//
GE07bhg4c05u:323: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api /
GE07bhg4c05u:325: śrīdharaḥ : karma kurvann api na lipyata ity etad viruddham ity āśaṅkya kartṛtvābhimānābhāvān na viruddham ity āha naiveti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c05u:326: karma-yogena yuktaḥ krameṇa tattvavid bhūtvā darśana-śravaṇādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:327: vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan kiṃcid apy ahaṃ na karomīti manyeta manyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:336: etāni karmāṇi kurvann api abhimānābhāvād brahma-vin na lipyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:337: tathā ca parāmarṣaṃ sūtram - tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvāghayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśād iti //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:341: ca tat-tac-ceṣṭāsu kriyamāṇāsu indriyāṇīndriyādīny evendriyārtheṣu sva-sva-viṣayeṣu
GE07bhg4c05u:342: vartante pravartante na tv aham iti dhārayann avadhārayann naiva kiṃcit karomīti
GE07bhg4c05u:343: manyeta manyate tattvavit paramārtha-darśī yuktaḥ samāhita-cittaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:344: athavādau yuktaḥ karma-yogena paścād antaḥkaraṇa-śuddhi-dvāreṇa tattvavid bhūtvā naiva kiṃcit karomīti manyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:345: tatra darśana-śravaṇa-sparśana-ghrāṇāśanāni cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ pañca-jñānendriyāṇāṃ vyāpārāḥ paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann ity uktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:349: grahaṇaṃ hastayor iti pañca karmendriya-vyāpārā gacchan pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann ity uktāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:353: artha-krama-vaśāt pāṭha-kramaṃ bhaṅktvā vyākhyātāv imau ślokau /
GE07bhg4c05u:354: yasmāt sarva-vyāpāreṣv apy ātmano 'kartṛtvam eva paśyati /
GE07bhg4c05u:355: ataḥ kurvann api na lipyata iti yuktam evoktam iti bhāvaḥ //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:357: yena karmaṇālepas taṃ prakāraṃ śikṣayati naiveti /
GE07bhg4c05u:358: yuktaḥ karma-yogī darśanādīni kurvann apīndriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan buddhyā niścinvan nirabhimānaḥ kiṃcid apy ahaṃ naiva karomīti manyate //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:360: yukto niṣkāma-karmī prādhānika-dehendriyādi-saṃsargād darśanādīni karmāṇi kurvann
GE07bhg4c05u:361: api tattva-vit viviktam ātma-tattvam anubhavan indriyārtheṣu rūpādiṣu indriyāṇi cakṣur-ādīni
GE07bhg4c05u:362: mad-vāsanānuguṇa-paramātma-preritāni vartanta iti dhārayan niścinvann ahaṃ kiṃcid
GE07bhg4c05u:364: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnann iti cakṣuḥ-śrotra-tvag-ghrāṇa-rasanānāṃ jñānendriyāṇāṃ darśana-śravaṇa-sparśanāghrānāśanāni vyāpārāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:369: śvasann iti prāṇādīnām unmiṣan nimiṣann iti nāgādīnāṃ prāṇa-bhedānām /
GE07bhg4c05u:373: na tu svarūpaika-nimittam iti manyata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:374: na svarūpa-prayuktam ātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ kiṃcid api nāstīti śakyam abhidhātuṃ nirdhāraṇe manane ca tasyābhidhānāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:375: tat tac ca jñānam eva tac cātmano nityam /
GE07bhg4c05u:376: na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilāpo vidyate iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:377: tat-siddhiś ca hariṇā dharma-bhūtena jñānena ca ity āhuḥ //8-9//
GE07bhg4c05u:379: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:380: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā //10//
GE07bhg4c05u:381: śrīdharaḥ : tarhi yasya karomīti abhimāno 'sti tasya karma-lepo durvāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:382: tathāviśuddha-cittatvāt saṃnyāso 'pi nāsti iti mahat saṅkaṭam āpannam ity āśaṅkyāha brahmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:385: yaḥ karmāṇi karoti asau pāpena bandhu-hetutayā pāpiṣṭhena puṇya-pāpātmakena karmaṇā na lipyate yathā padma-patram ambhasi sthitam api tenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat //10//
GE07bhg4c05u:387: tarhy avidvān kartṛtvābhimānāl lipyetaiva tathā ca karthaṃ tasya saṃnyāsa-pūrvikā jñāna-niṣṭhā syād iti tatrāha brahmaṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:388: brahmaṇi parameśvara ādhāya samarpya saṅgaṃ phalābhilāṣaṃ tyaktveśvarārthaṃ bhṛtya
GE07bhg4c05u:389: iva svāmy-arthaṃ sva-phala-nirapekṣatayā karomīty abhiprāyeṇa karmāṇi laukikāni vaidikāni
GE07bhg4c05u:390: ca karoti yo lipyate na sa pāpena pāpa-puṇyātmakena karmaṇeti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:391: yathā padma-patram upari prakṣiptenāmbhasā na lipyate tadvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:394: kiṃ ca brahmaṇi parameśvare mayi samarpya saṅgaṃ tyaktvā sābhimāno 'pi karmāsaktiṃ vihāya yaḥ karmāṇi karoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:399: tasmād etad brahma-nāma-rūpam annaṃ ca jñāyata iti śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:400: mama yonir mahad brahma iti vakṣyamāṇāc ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:401: dehendriyādīni pradhāna-pariṇāma-viśeṣāṇi bhavanti tad-rūpatayā pariṇate pradhāne darśanādīni karmāṇy ādhāya tasyaivaitāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:402: na tu tad-viviktasya śuddhasya mameti nirdhāryety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:404: yas tāni karoti sa tādṛg dehādimattayā sann api dehādy-ātmābhimānena pāpena na lipyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:406: na ca mayi saṃnyasya karmāṇi iti pūrva-svārasyād brahmaṇi paramātmanīti vyākhyeyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:410: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GE07bhg4c05u:412: śrīdharaḥ : kevalaṃ sattva-śuddhi-mātra-phalam eva tasya karmaṇaḥ syāt yasmāt kāyeneti /
GE07bhg4c05u:414: yoginaḥ saṅgaṃ tyaktvā kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
GE07bhg4c05u:416: sarva-vyāpāreṣu mamatā-varjanāya yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ karma kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:422: kāyena manasā buddhyendriyair api yoginaḥ karmiṇaḥ phala-saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karma kurvanti kāyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kevalair iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:423: īśvarāyaiva karomi na mama phalāyeti mamatā-śūnyair ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:427: indrāya svāhā ity ādinā havir-ādy-arpaṇa-kāle yadyapi manaḥ kvāpy anyatra tad apīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:429: baladevaḥ : sad-ācāraṃ pramāṇayann etad vivṛṇoti kāyeneti /
GE07bhg4c05u:430: kāyādibhiḥ sādhyaṃ karma kāyādy-ahaṃbhāva-śūnyā yoginaḥ kurvanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:434: yuktaḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm /
GE07bhg4c05u:436: śrīdharaḥ : nanu kathaṃ tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścid badhyate iti vyavasthā ?
GE07bhg4c05u:438: yuktaḥ parameśvaraika-niṣṭhaḥ san karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ tyaktvā karmaṇi kurvann ātyantikīṃ śāntiṃ mokṣaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:439: ayuktas tu bahirmukhaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā phala āsakto nitarāṃ bandhaṃ prāpnoti //12//
GE07bhg4c05u:441: kartṛtvābhimāna-sāmye 'pi tenaiva karmaṇā kaścin mucyate kaścit tu badhyata iti vaiṣamye ko hetur iti tatrāha yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:442: yukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety evam abhiprāyavān karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā
GE07bhg4c05u:443: karmāṇi kurvan śāntim mokṣākhyām āpnoti naiṣṭhikīṃ sattva-śuddhi-nitya-vastu-viveka-saṃnyāsa-jñāna-niṣṭhā-krameṇa jātām iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:444: yas tu punar ayukta īśvarāyaivaitāni karmāṇi na mama phalāyety abhiprāya-śūnyaḥ sa
GE07bhg4c05u:445: kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ pravṛttyā mama phalāyaivedaṃ karma karomīti phale sakto nibadhyate
GE07bhg4c05u:447: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt tvam api yuktaḥ san karmāṇi kurv iti vākya-śeṣaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c05u:449: karma-karaṇe anāsakty-āsaktī eva mokṣa-bandha-hetū ity āha yukto yogī niṣkāma-karmītity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:450: naiṣṭhikīm niṣṭhā-prāptāṃ śāntiṃ mokṣam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:453: baladevaḥ : yukta ātmārpita-manāḥ karma-phalaṃ tyaktvā kurvann naiṣṭhikīm sthirāṃ śāntim ātmāvaloka-lakṣaṇām āpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:454: ayukta ātmānarpita-manāḥ karma-phale saktaḥ kāma-kāreṇa kāmataḥ karmaṇi pravṛttyā nibadhyate saṃsarati //12//
GE07bhg4c05u:457: nava-dvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan //13//
GE07bhg4c05u:458: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃ tāvac citta-śuddhi-śūnyasya saṃnyāsāt karma-yogo viśiṣyate ity etat prapañcitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:459: idānīṃ śuddha-cittasya saṃnyāsaḥ śreṣṭha ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:461: sarvāṇi karmāṇi vikṣepakāni manasā viveka-yuktena saṃnyasya sukhaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhaḥ sann āste /
GE07bhg4c05u:462: kvāsta iti ? ata āha nava-dvāra iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:463: netre nāsike karṇau mukhaṃ ceti sapta śiro-gatāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:465: evaṃ nava-dvārāṇi yasmiṃs tasmin pure puravad ahaṅkāra-śūnye dehe dehy avatiṣṭhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:466: ahaṅkārābhāvād eva svyaṃ tena dehena naiva kurvan mama-kārābhāvāc ca na kārayan ity aviśuddha-cittād vyavṛttir uktā /
GE07bhg4c05u:467: aśuddha-citto hi saṃnyasya punaḥ karoti kārayati ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:471: aśuddha-cittasya kevalāt saṃnyāsāt karma-yogaḥ śreyān iti pūrvoktaṃ prapañcyādhunā śuddha-cittasya sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa eva śreyān ity āha sarva-karmāṇīti
GE07bhg4c05u:472: nityaṃ naimittikaṃ kāmyaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ ceti sarvāṇi karmāṇi manasā karmaṇy akarma
GE07bhg4c05u:473: yaḥ paśyed ity atroktenākartrātma-svarūpa-samyag-darśanena saṃnyasya parityajya prārabdha-karma-vaśād āste tiṣṭhaty eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:474: kiṃ duḥkhena nety āha sukham anāyāsena /
GE07bhg4c05u:476: kāya-vāṅ-manāṃsi svacchandāni kuto na vyāpriyante tatrāha vaśī sva-vaśīkṛta-kārya-karaṇa-saṅghātaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:477: kvāste ? nava-dvāre pure dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike vāg eketi śirasi sapta /
GE07bhg4c05u:478: dve pāyūpasthākhye adha iti nava-dvāra-viśiṣṭe dehe /
GE07bhg4c05u:481: ajño hi dehatādātmyābhimānād deha eva na tu dehī /
GE07bhg4c05u:482: sa ca dehādhikaraṇam evātmano 'dhikaraṇaṃ manyamāno gṛhe bhūmāvasāne vāham āsa ity abhimanyate na tu dehe 'ham āsa iti bheda-darśanābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:483: saṃghāta-vyatiriktātma-darśī tu sarva-karma-saṃnyāsī bheda-darśanād dehe 'ham āsa iti pratipadyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:484: ataeva dehādi-vyāpārāṇām avidyayātmany akriye samāropitānāṃ vidyayā bādha eva sarva-karma-saṃnyāsa ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:485: etasmād evājña-vailakṣaṇyādy-uktaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ nava-dvāre pure āsta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:486: nanu dehādi-vyāpārāṇām ātmany āropitānāṃ nau-vyāpārāṇāṃ tīrastha-vṛkṣa iva vidyayā
GE07bhg4c05u:487: bādhe 'pi sva-vyāpāreṇātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ dehādi-vyāpāreṣu kārayitṛtvaṃ ca syād iti
GE07bhg4c05u:488: nety āha naiva kurvan na kārayan /
GE07bhg4c05u:491: ato 'nāsaktaḥ karmāṇi kurvann api jñeyaḥ sa nitya-saṃnyāsī iti pūrvoktavad vastutaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:492: saṃnyāsī evocyate tatrāha sarva-karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya kāyādi-vyāpāreṇa bahiḥ kurvann
GE07bhg4c05u:494: kutra ? nava-dvāre pure ahaṃ-bhāva-śūnye dehe dehy utpanna-jñāno jīvo naiva kurvann iti karma-sukhasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvaṃ naivāstīti jānan,
GE07bhg4c05u:495: na kārayann iti nāpi teṣu prayojana-kartṛtvam ity api jānann ity arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c05u:497: vivekatā manasā tādṛśi pradhāne sarva-karmāṇi saṃnyasyārpayitvā dehādinā bahis tāni kurvann api vaśī jitendriyaḥ sukhaṃ āste /
GE07bhg4c05u:498: nava-dvāre pure puravad ahaṃ-bhāva-varjite dehe dve netre dve nāsike dve śrotre mukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:499: ceti śirasi sapta dvārāṇi adhastāt tu pāyūpasthākhye dve iti nava-dvārāṇi dehī labdha-jñānojīvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:500: naiveti dehādi-viviktasyātmanaḥ karmasu kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvaṃ ca nāstīti vijānann ity arthaḥ //13//
GE07bhg4c05u:502: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:504: śrīdharaḥ : nanu eṣa hy evainaṃ sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GE07bhg4c05u:505: eṣa asādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity-ādi-śruteḥ parameśvareṇaiva śubhāśubha-phaleṣu karmasu kartṛtvena prayujyamāno 'svatantraḥ puruṣaḥ kathaṃ tāni karmāṇi tyajet ?
GE07bhg4c05u:506: īśvareṇaiva jñāna-mārge prayujyamāṇaḥ śubhāśubhani ca tyakṣyatīti cet ?
GE07bhg4c05u:507: evaṃ sati vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇyābhyām īśvarasyāpi prayojaka-kartṛtvāt puṇya-pāpa-sambandhaḥ syād ity āśaṅkyāha na kartṛtvam iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c05u:508: prabhur īśvaro jīva-lokasya kartṛtvādikaṃ na sṛjati,
GE07bhg4c05u:510: anādy-avidyā-kāma-vaśāt pravṛtti-svabhāvaṃ jīva-lokam īśvaraḥ karmasu niyuṅkte /
GE07bhg4c05u:511: na tu svayam eva kartṛtvādikam utpādayatīty arthaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c05u:513: devadattasya svagataiva gatir yathā sthitau satyāṃ na bhavati evam ātmano 'pi kartṛtvaṃ kārayitṛtvam na svagatam eva sat-saṃnyāse sati na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c05u:514: athavā nabhasi tala-malinatādivad vastu-vṛttyā tatra nāsty eveti sandehāpohāyāha na kartṛtvam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:515: lokasya dehādeḥ kartṛtvaṃ prabhur ātmā svāmī na sṛjati tvaṃ kurv iti niyogena tasya kārayitā na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:516: nāpi lokasya karmāṇīpsitatamāni ghaṭādīni svayaṃ sṛjati kartāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:517: nāpi lokasya karma kṛtavatas tat-phala-sambandhaṃ sṛjati bhojayitāpi bhoktāpi na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:518: na samānaḥ sann ubhau lokāv anusaṃcarati dhyāyatīva lelāyatīva sadhīḥ ity ādi śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:519: atrāpi śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate [Gītā 13.31] ity ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:520: yadi kiṃcid api svato na kārayati na karoti cātmā kas tarhi kārayan kurvaṃś ca pravartata iti tatrāha svabhāvas tv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:523: nanu ca yadi jīvasya vastutaḥ kartṛtvādikaṃ naivāsti,
GE07bhg4c05u:524: tarhi parameśvara-sṛṣṭe jagati sarvatra jīvasya kartṛtva-bhokṛtvādi-darśanān manye parameśareṇaiva balāt tasya kartṛtvādikaṃ sṛṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c05u:526: tatra na hi nahīty āha na kartṛtvam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:528: na ca karma-phalair bhogaiḥ saṃyogam api,
GE07bhg4c05u:530: taṃ jīvaṃ kartṛtvādy-abhimānam ārohayitum iti bhāvaḥ //14//
GE07bhg4c05u:531: baladevaḥ : etad dvayaṃ śuddhasya nāstīti viśadayati neti /
GE07bhg4c05u:532: prabhur dehendriyādīnāṃ svāmī jīvo lokasya janasya kartṛtvaṃ na sṛjatīti tvaṃ kurv iti kārayitā na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:533: nāpi tasyepsitatamāni karmāṇi mālyāmbarādīni sṛjatīti svayaṃ kartāpi na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:534: na ca karma-phalena sukhena duḥkhena ca saṃyogaṃ sambandhaṃ sṛjatīti bhojayitā bhoktā ca na bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:535: yady evaṃ, tarhi kaḥ kārayan kurvaṃś ca pratīyate ?
GE07bhg4c05u:537: anādi-pravṛttā pradhāna-vāsanātra svabhāva-śabdenokta-prādhānika-dehādimān jīvaḥ kārayitā kartā ceti na viviktasya tattvam iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:538: śuddhe 'pi kiṃcit kartṛtvam asty eva pūrvatra sukhāsane tattvasyokteḥ bhānādāv ivaitad bodhyaṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:542: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:544: śrīdharaḥ : yasmād evaṃ tasmāt nādatta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:545: prayojako 'pi san prabhuḥ kasyacit pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte na bhajate /
GE07bhg4c05u:548: yadi hi svārtha-kāmanayā kārayet tarhi tathā syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:551: nanu bhaktān anugṛhṇato 'bhaktān nigṛhṇataś ca vaiṣamyopalambhāt katham āpta-kāmatvam iti ?
GE07bhg4c05u:554: evam ajñānena sarvatra samaḥ parameśvara ity evaṃbhūtaṃ jñānam āvṛtam /
GE07bhg4c05u:559: tathā ca śrutiḥ - eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam unninīyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:560: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate ity ādiḥ / smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c05u:562: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśvabhram eva ca // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:563: tathā ca jīveśvarayoḥ kartṛtva-kārayitṛtvābhyāṃ bhoktṛtva-bhojayitṛtvābhyāṃ ca pāpa-puṇya-lepa-sambhavāt katham uktaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartata iti tatrāha nādatta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:564: paramārthataḥ vibhuḥ parameśvaraḥ kasyacit jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca naivādatte paramārthato jīvasya kartṛtvābhāvāt parameśvarasya ca kārayitṛtvābhāvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:565: kathaṃ tarhi śrutiḥ smṛtir loka-vyavahāraś ca tatrāha ajñānenāvaraṇa-vikṣepā-śaktimatā
GE07bhg4c05u:568: tena svarūpāvaraṇena muhyanti pramātṛ-prameya-pramāṇa-kartṛ-karma-karaṇa-bhoktṛ-bhogya-bhogākhya-nava-vidha-saṃsāra-rūpaṃ moham atasmiṃs tad-avabhāsa-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:569: vikṣepaṃ gacchanti jantavo janana-śīlāḥ saṃsāriṇo vastu-svarūpādarśinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:571: tasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ mūḍha-pratyayānuvādinyāv ete śruti-smṛtī vāstavādvaita-bodhi-vākya-śeṣa-bhūte iti na doṣaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c05u:574: tasmād eva na tasya pāpa-puṇya-bhāgitvam ity āha nādatta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:576: kintu tadīyā khalu yā śaktir avidyā saiva jīva-jñānam āvṛṇoti ity āha ajñānenāvidyayā /
GE07bhg4c05u:579: baladevaḥ : nanu yadi viśuddhasya jīvasya tādṛśa-karma-kartṛtvādi nāstīti brūṣe,
GE07bhg4c05u:580: tarhi kautukākrāntaḥ paramātmā pradhānaṃ tad-gale nipātya tat-pariṇāma-dehendriyādi-matas tasya tad-racitavān ity āpadyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:582: anyathā eṣa u hy eva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam ebhyo lokebhya unninīṣate /
GE07bhg4c05u:583: eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yam adho ninīṣate iti śrutiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:585: īśvara-prerito gacchet svargaṃ vāśv abhram eva ca //
GE07bhg4c05u:588: prayojake tasmin vaiṣamyādikaṃ pāpādi-bhāgitvaṃ ca syād iti cet tatrāha nādatta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:591: jīvaṃ tad-vāsanānusāreṇa karmāṇi kārayan kasyacij jīvasya pāpaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca nādatte na gṛhṇāti /
GE07bhg4c05u:597: audāsīnya-mātre 'yaṃ gandhādi-dṛṣṭānto na tv icchāyā abhāve tasyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:599: tarhi jīvās taṃ viṣamaṃ kuto vadanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:601: anādi-tad-vaimukhyenājñānena jīvānāṃ nityam api jñānam āvṛtaṃ tirohitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:603: samam api taṃ vimūḍhā viṣamaṃ vadanti na vijñā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:604: āha caivaṃ sūtrakāraḥ - vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati [Vs 2.1.35],
GE07bhg4c05u:605: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvāt [Vs 2.1.36] iti //15//
GE07bhg4c05u:607: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:609: śrīdharaḥ : jñāninas tu na muhyantīty āha jñāneneti /
GE07bhg4c05u:610: bhagavato jñānena yeṣāṃ tad-vaiṣamyopalambhakam ajñānaṃ nāśitam taj jñānaṃ teṣām ajñānaṃ nāśayitvā tat paraṃ paripūrṇam īśvara-svarūpaṃ prakāśayati
GE07bhg4c05u:611: yathādityas tamo nirasya samastaṃ vastu-jātaṃ prakāśayati tadvat //16//
GE07bhg4c05u:613: tarhi sarveṣām andādy-ajñānāvṛtatvāt kathaṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttiḥ syād ?
GE07bhg4c05u:619: nāśitaṃ bādhitaṃ kāla-traye 'py asad evāsattayā jñātam adhiṣṭhāna-caitanya-mātratāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:621: bhagavad-anugṛhītānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ teṣāṃ taj jñānaṃ kartṛ / ādityavad
GE07bhg4c05u:622: yathādityaḥ svodaya-mātreṇaiva tamo niravaśeṣaṃ nivartayati na tu kaṃcit sahāyam
GE07bhg4c05u:623: apekṣate tathā brahma-jñānam api śuddha-sattva-pariṇāmatvād vyāpaka-prakāśa-rūpaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:624: svotpatti-mātreṇaiva sahakāryantara-nirapekṣatayā sa-kāryam ajñānaṃ nivartayat param
GE07bhg4c05u:625: satya-jñānaānantānanda-rūpam ekam evādvitīyaṃ paramātma-tattvaṃ prakāśayati praticchāyā-grahaṇa-mātreṇaiva
GE07bhg4c05u:627: atrājñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānena nāśitam ity ajñānansyāvaraṇatva-jñāna-nāśyatvābhyāṃ jñānābhāva-rūpatvaṃ vyāvartitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:628: nahy abhāvaḥ kiṃcid āvṛṇoti na vā jñānābhāvo jñānena nāśyate svabhāvato nāśa-rūpatvāt tasya /
GE07bhg4c05u:629: tasmād aham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīty ādi-sākṣi-pratyakṣa-siddhaṃ bhāva-rūpam evājñānam iti bhagavato matam /
GE07bhg4c05u:632: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tad yo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tad abhavat tatha rṣīṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:633: tathā manuṣyāṇāṃ tad idam apy etarhi ya evaṃ vedāhaṃ brahmāsmīti sa idaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati
GE07bhg4c05u:634: ity ādir yad viṣayaṃ yad-āśrayam ajñānaṃ tad-viṣaya-tad-āśraya-pramāṇa-jñānāt tan-nivṛttir
GE07bhg4c05u:636: tatrājñāna-gatam āvaraṇaṃ dvividham - ekaṃ sato 'py asattvāpādakam anyat tu bhāto 'py abhānāpādakam /
GE07bhg4c05u:638: anumite 'pi vahny-ādau parvate vahnir nāstīty ādi-bhramādarśanāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:639: tathā satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahmāsti iti vākyāt parokṣa-niścaye 'pi brahma nāstīti bhramo nivartata eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:640: asty eva brahma kintu mama na bhātīty ekaṃ bhrama-janakaṃ dvitīyam abhānāvaraṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:642: sa ca sākṣātkāro vedānta-vākyenaiva janyate nirvikalpaka ity ādy advaita-siddhāv anusandheyam //16//
GE07bhg4c05u:645: tathaivāparā tasya vidyā-śaktir avidyāṃ vināśya jñānaṃ prakāśayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:648: teṣāṃ jīvānāṃ jñānam eva kartṛ ādityavad ity-āditya-prabhā yathāndhakāraṃ vināśya ghaṭa-paṭādikaṃ prakāśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:649: tathaiva vidyayaivāvidyāṃ vināśya taj-jīva-niṣṭhaṃ jñānaṃ param aprākṛtaṃ prakāśayati /
GE07bhg4c05u:650: tena parameśvaro na kam api badhnāti,
GE07bhg4c05u:652: kintv ajñāna-jñāne prakṛter eva dharmaḥ krameṇa badhnāti mocayati ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:654: anāsakti-śāntyādayo mocakāś ca prakṛter eva dharmāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:655: kintu parameśvarasyāntaryāmitva eva prakṛtes te te dharmā udbudhyanta ity etad-aṃśenaiva tasya prayojakatvam iti na tasya vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye
GE07bhg4c05u:656: baladevaḥ : vijñā na muhyantīty etad āha jñāneneti /
GE07bhg4c05u:659: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ [Gītā 4.38] iti cokta-mahimnā sad-guru-prasāda-labdhena sva-parātma-viṣayakena
GE07bhg4c05u:660: jñānena yeṣāṃ sat-prasaṅgināṃ tad-vaimukhyam ajñānaṃ nāśitaṃ pradhvaṃsitaṃ teṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:662: dehādeḥ paraṃ jīvaṃ vaiṣamyādi-doṣāt param īśvaraṃ ca bodhayati /
GE07bhg4c05u:663: ādityavat yathā ravir udita eva tamo nirasyan yathāvad vastu pradarśayati,
GE07bhg4c05u:664: tathā sad-gurūpadeśa-labdham ātma-jñānaṃ yathāvad ātma-vastv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:665: atra vinaṣṭājñānānāṃ jīvānāṃ bahutvaṃ nigadatā pārtha-sārathinā mokṣe teṣāṃ tad-darśitaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:666: aupādhikatvaṃ tasya praty uktaṃ neme janādhipāḥ ity upakramoktaṃ ca tat sopapattikam abhūt //16 //
GE07bhg4c05u:670: śrīdharaḥ : evaṃbhūteśvaropāsakānāṃ phalam āha tad-buddhaya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:674: tad eva param ayamam āśrayo yeṣām /
GE07bhg4c05u:675: tataś ca tat-prasāda-labdhenātma-jñānena nirdhūtaṃ nirastaṃ kalmaṣaṃ yeṣām /
GE07bhg4c05u:679: tasmin jñāna-prakāśite paramātma-tattve sac-cid-ānanda-ghana eva bāhya-sarva-viṣaya-parityāgena
GE07bhg4c05u:680: sādhana-paripākāt paryavasitā buddhir antaḥkaraṇa-vṛttiḥ sākṣātkāra-lakṣaṇā yeṣāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:681: te tad-buddhayaḥ sarvadā nirbīja-samādhi-bhāja ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:682: tat kiṃ boddhāro jīvā boddhavyaṃ brahma-tattvam iti boddhṛ-boddhavya-bhāvo hi māyā-vijṛmbhito na vāstavābheda-virodhīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:685: ajñā api hi vastu-gatyā tad-ātmāna iti kathaṃ tad-vyāvṛttir iti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c05u:687: ajñā hi anātma-bhūte dehādāv ātmābhimānina iti na tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyante /
GE07bhg4c05u:688: vijñās tu nivṛtta-dehādy-abhimānā iti virodhi-nivṛttyā tad-ātmāna iti vyapadiśyanta iti yuktaṃ viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c05u:689: nanu karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepe sati kathaṃ dehādy-abhimāna-nivṛttir iti tatrāha tan-niṣṭhā iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:690: tasminn eva brahmaṇi sarva-karmānuṣṭhāna-vikṣepa-nivṛttyā niṣṭhā sthitir yeṣāṃ te tan-niṣṭhāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:692: phala-rāge sati kathaṃ tat-sādhana-bhūta-karma-tyāga iti tatrāha tat-parāyaṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:693: tad eva param ayanaṃ prāptavyaṃ yeṣāṃ te tat-parāyaṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:695: atra tad-buddhaya ity anena sākṣātkāra uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:697: tat-parāyaṇā ity anena vairāgya-prakarṣaṃ ity uttarottarasya pūrva-pūrva-hetutvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:698: ukta-viśeṣaṇā yatayo gacchanty apunar-āvṛttiṃ punar-deha-sambandhābhāva-rūpāṃ muktiṃ prāpnuvanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:699: sakṛn muktānām api punar deha-sambandhaḥ kuto na syād iti tatrāha jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:700: jñānena nirdhūtaṃ samūlam unmūlitaṃ punar-deha-sambandha-kāraṇaṃ kalmaṣaṃ puṇya-pāpātmakaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:702: jñānenānādy-ajñāna-nivṛttyā tat-kārya-karma-kṣaye tan-mūlakaṃ punar deha-grahaṇaṃ kathaṃ bhaved iti bhāvaḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c05u:705: na tu paramātma-jñānaṃ bhaktyāham ekayā grāhyaḥ iti bhagavad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:706: tasmāt paramātma-jñānārthaṃ jñānibhir api punar viśeṣato bhaktiḥ kāryā ity ata āha tad-buddhaya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:708: tasmin parameśvara eva buddhir yeṣām te tam-manana-parā ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:709: tad-ātmānas tan-manaskās tam eva dhyāyanta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:710: tan-niṣṭhāḥ jñānaṃ mayi saṃnyaset iti bhagavad-ukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:714: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:715: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram // [Gītā 18.55] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:716: jñāna-nirdhūta-kalmaṣā jñānena vidyāyaiva pūrvam eva dhvasta-samastāvidyāḥ //17//
GE07bhg4c05u:717: baladevaḥ : paramātmany avaiṣamyādi-dhyāyatāṃ phalam āha tad iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:718: tasmiṃs tad-avaiṣamyādike guṇa-gaṇe buddhir niścayātmikā yeṣāṃ te /
GE07bhg4c05u:719: tad-ātmānas tasmin niviṣṭa-manasaḥ tan-niṣṭhās tat-tātparyavantas tat-parāyaṇās tat-samāśrayāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:720: evam abhyastena tad-vaiṣamyādi-guṇa-jñānena nirdhūta-kalmaṣā vinaṣṭa-tad-vaimukhyāḥ santa apunar-āvṛttiṃ muktiṃ gacchantīti //17//
GE07bhg4c05u:723: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama-darśinaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:724: śrīdharaḥ : kīdṛśās te jñānino ye 'punar-āvṛttiṃ gacchantīty apekṣāyām āha vidyā-vinaya-saṃpanna iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:725: viṣameṣv api samaṃ brahmaiva draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te paṇḍitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:728: śuno yaḥ pacati tasmin śvapāke ca iti karmaṇā vaiṣamyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:729: gavi hastini śuni ceti jātito vaiṣamyaṃ darśitam //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:731: deha-pātād ūrdhvaṃ videha-kaivalya-rūpaṃ jñāna-phalam uktvā prārabdha-karma-vaśāt saty api dehe jīvan-mukti-rūpaṃ tat-phalam āha vidyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:734: tābhyāṃ saṃpanne brahma-vidi vinīte ca brāhmaṇe sāttvike sarvottame /
GE07bhg4c05u:736: tathā hastini śuni śvapāke cātyanta tāmase sarvādhame 'pi /
GE07bhg4c05u:737: sattvādi-guṇais taj-jaiś ca saṃskārair aspṛṣṭam eva samaṃ brahma draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te sama-darśinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:739: yathā gaṅgā-toye taḍāge surāyāṃ mūtre vā pratibimbitasyādityasya na tad-guṇa-doṣa-sambandhas
GE07bhg4c05u:742: sarvatra sama-dṛṣṭyaiva rāga-dveṣa-rāhityena paramānanda-sphūrtyā jīvan-muktim anubhavantīty arthaḥ //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:744: tataś ca guṇātītānāṃ teṣāṃ guṇa-maye vastu-mātra eva tāratamya-mayaṃ viśeṣam ajighṛkṣūṇāṃ sama-buddhir eva syād ity āha vidyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:747: śuni ca śvapāke ceti tāmas-jātitvād adhame 'pi tat-tad-viśeṣāgrahaṇāt sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā guṇātītāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:751: tādṛśe brāhmaṇe śvapāke ceti karmaṇaitau viṣamau gavi hastini śuni ceti jātyaite viṣamāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:752: evaṃ viṣamatayā sṛṣṭeṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu ye paramātmānaṃ samaṃ paśyanti,
GE07bhg4c05u:754: tat-karmānusāriṇī tena teṣāṃ tathā tathā sṛṣṭiḥ,
GE07bhg4c05u:755: na tu rāga-dveṣānusāriṇīti parjanyavat sarvatra samaḥ paramātmeti //18//
GE07bhg4c05u:757: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:758: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:759: śrīdharaḥ : nanu viṣamesu sama-darśanaṃ niṣiddhaṃ kurvanto 'pi kathaṃ te paṇḍitāḥ ?
GE07bhg4c05u:760: yathāha gautamaḥ samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjātaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:761: asyārthaḥ samāya pūjayā viṣame prakāre kṛte sati viṣamāya ca same prakāre kṛte sati sa pūjaka iha lokāt para-lokāc ca hīyata iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:766: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye samatve sthitaṃ /
GE07bhg4c05u:767: tatra hetuḥ -- hi yasmād brahma samaṃ nirdoṣaṃ ca tasmāt te sama-darśino brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:769: gautamoktas tu doṣo brahma-bhāva-prāpteḥ pūrvam eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:772: nanu sāttvika-rājasa-tāmaseṣu svabhāva-viṣameṣu prāṇiṣu samatva-darśanaṃ dharma-śāstra-niṣiddham /
GE07bhg4c05u:773: tathā ca tasyānnam abhojyam ity upakramya gautamaḥ smarati samāsam ābhyāṃ viṣama-same pūjāta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:777: pūjā-viśesaḥ kriyate tat-samāyaivānyasmai caturveda-pāragāya sad-ācārāya viṣame tad-apekṣayā
GE07bhg4c05u:779: tathālpa-vedānāṃ hīnācārāṇāṃ yādṛśo hīna-sādhanaḥ pūjā-prakāraḥ kriyate tādṛśāyaivāsamāya
GE07bhg4c05u:781: kṛte, uttamasya hīnatayā hīnasyottamatayā pūjāto hetos tasya pūjayitur annam abhojyaṃ bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:782: pūjayitā pratipatti-viśesam akurvan dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata iti ca doṣāntaram /
GE07bhg4c05u:783: yadyapi yatīnāṃ niṣparigrahāṇāṃ pākābhāvād dhanābhāvāc cābhojyānnatvaṃ dhana-hīnatvaṃ ca svata eva vidyate tathāpi dharma-hānir doso bhavaty eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:785: tapo-dhanānāṃ ca tapa eva dhanam iti tad-dhānir api dūṣaṇaṃ bhavaty eveti kathaṃ sama-darśinaḥ paṇḍitā jīvan-muktā iti prāpte pariharati ihaiveti
GE07bhg4c05u:786: taiḥ sama-darśibhiḥ paṇḍitair ihaiva jīvana-daśāyām eva jito 'tikrāntaḥ sargaḥ sṛjyata iti vyutpattyā dvaita-prapañcaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:787: deha-pātād ūrdhvam atikramitavya iti kim u vaktavyam ?
GE07bhg4c05u:789: yeṣāṃ sāmye sarva-bhūteṣu viṣameṣv api vartamānasya brahmaṇaḥ sama-bhāve sthitaṃ niścalaṃ manaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:790: hi yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ sarva-vikāra-śūnyaṃ kūṭastha-nityam ekaṃ ca brahma tasmāt te brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:792: duṣṭatvam hi dvedhā bhavati aduṣṭasyāpi duṣṭa-sambandhāt svato duṣṭatvād vā /
GE07bhg4c05u:795: tatra doṣavatsu śvapākādiṣu sthitaṃ doṣair duṣyati brahmeti mūḍhair vibhāvyamānam api sarva-doṣāsaṃsṛṣṭam eva brahma vyomavad asaṅgatvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:800: na lipyate loka-duḥkhena bāhyaḥ // iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:801: nāpi kāmādi-dharmavattayā svata eva kaluṣitaṃ kāmāder antaḥkaraṇa-dharmatvasya śruti-smṛti-siddhatvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:802: tasmān nirdoṣa-brahma-rūpā yatayo jīvan-muktā abhojyānnādi-doṣa-duṣṭāś ceti vyāhṛtam /
GE07bhg4c05u:806: dhanād dharmāc ca hīyata ity upasaṃhārāc ceti draṣṭavyam //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:809: ihaiva iha loka eva sṛjyata iti sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:811: iha sādhana-daśāyām eva taiḥ sargaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ parābhūtaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:812: kaiḥ ? yeṣāṃ manaḥ sāmye 'vaiṣamyākhye brahma-dharme sthitaṃ niviṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c05u:815: hi yato brahmaṇy avaiṣamyādikaṃ niścikyus tasmāt prapañce tiṣṭhanto 'pi te brahmaṇy eva sthitāḥ muktis teṣāṃ sulabhety arthaḥ //19//
GE07bhg4c05u:817: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:819: śrīdharaḥ : brahma-prāptasya lakṣaṇam āha na prahṛṣyed iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:820: brahma-vid bhūtvā brahmaṇy eva yaḥ sthitaḥ sa priyaṃ prāpya na prahṛṣyet prakṛṣṭa-harṣavān syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:821: apriyam prāpya ca nodvijet na viṣīdatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:822: yataḥ sthira-buddhir sthirā niścalā buddhir yasya /
GE07bhg4c05u:825: yasmān nirdoṣaṃ samaṃ brahma tasmāt tad-rūpam ātmānaṃ sākṣātkurvann āha na prahṛṣyed iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:826: duḥkheṣv anudvigna-manāḥ sukheṣu vigata-spṛhaḥ ity atra vyākhyātaṃ pūrvārdham /
GE07bhg4c05u:827: jīvan-muktānāṃ svābhāvikaṃ caritam eva mumukṣubhiḥ prayatna-pūrvakam anuṣṭheyam iti vadituṃ liṅga-pratyayau /
GE07bhg4c05u:828: advitīyātma-darśana-śīlasya vyatirikta-priyāpriya-prāpty-ayogyāc ca tan-nimittau harṣa-viṣādāv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:829: advitīyātma-darśanam eva vivṛṇoti - sthira-buddhiḥ sthirā niścalā saṃnyāsa-pūrvaka-vedānta-vākya-vicāra-paripākeṇa
GE07bhg4c05u:830: sarva-saṃśaya-śūnyatvena nirvicikitsā niścitā brahmaṇi buddhir yasya sa tathā labdha-śravaṇa-manana-phala iti yāvat /
GE07bhg4c05u:831: etādṛśasya sarvāsaṃbhāvanā-śūnyatve 'pi viparīta-bhāva-pratibandhāt sākṣātkāro nodetīti nididhyāsanam āha - asaṃmūḍhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:834: tataś ca samādhi-paripākeṇa nirdoṣe same brahmaṇy eva sthito nānyatreti brahmaṇi sthito jīvan-muktaḥ sthita-prajña ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:835: etādṛśasya dvaita-darśanābhāvāt praharṣodvegau na bhavata ity ucitam eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:839: evaṃ laukika-priyāpriyādiṣv api teṣāṃ sāmyam āha na prahṛṣyed iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:842: sādhana-daśāyām evam abhyased iti vivakṣayā vā liṅ /
GE07bhg4c05u:844: baladevaḥ : brahmaṇi sthitasya lakṣaṇam āha neti /
GE07bhg4c05u:845: vartamāne dehe sthitaḥ prārabdhākṛṣṭaṃ priyam apriyaṃ ca prāpya na prahṛṣyen na codvijet /
GE07bhg4c05u:846: kutaḥ ? sthirā svātmani buddhir yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:847: asaṃmūḍho 'nityena dehena nityam ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaṃ na labdhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:851: bāhya-sparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:853: śrīdharaḥ : moha-nivṛttyā buddhi-sthairye hetum āha bāhya-sparśeṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:856: ātmani antaḥ-karaṇe yad upaśamātmakaṃ sāttvikaṃ sukham tad vindati labhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:857: sa copaśamaṃ sukhaṃ labdhvā brahmaṇi yogena samādhinā yuktas tadaikyaṃ prāpta ātmā yasya so 'kṣayaṃ sukham aśnute prāpnoti //21//
GE07bhg4c05u:859: nanu bāhya-viṣaya-prīter aneka-janmānubhūtatvenātipracalatvāt tad-āsakta-cittasya katham alaukike brahmaṇi dṛṣṭa-sarva-sukha-rahite sthitiḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:864: dṛṣṭānandābhilāṣaṃ sa na mandīkartum apy alam // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:868: teṣv asaktātmānāsakta-cittas tṛṣṇā-śūnyatayā viraktaḥ sann ātmani antaḥ-karaṇa eva bāhya-viṣaya-nirapekṣaṃ yad upaśamātmakaṃ sukhaṃ tad vindati labhate nirmala-sattva-vṛttyā /
GE07bhg4c05u:870: yac ca kāma-sukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:872: athavā pratyag-ātmani tvaṃ-padārthe yat sukhaṃ svarūpa-bhūtaṃ suṣuptāv anubhūyamānaṃ bāhya-viṣayāsakti-pratibandhād alambhamānaṃ tad eva tad-abhāvāl labhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:873: na kevalaṃ tvaṃ-padārtha-sukham eva labhate kintu tat-padārthaikyānubhavena pūrṇa-sukham
GE07bhg4c05u:874: apīty āha sa tṛṣṇā-śūnyo brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tena yuktas tasmin vyāpṛta
GE07bhg4c05u:876: athavā brahmaṇi tat-padārthe yogena vākyārthānubhava-rūpeṇa samādhinā yukta aikyaṃ prāpta ātmā tvaṃ-padārtha-svarūpaṃ yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:877: sukham akṣayam anantaṃ sva-svarūpa-bhūtam aśnute vyāpnoti sukhānubhava-rūpa eva sarvadā bhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:879: tasmād ātmany akṣaya-sukhānubhavārthī san bāhya-viṣaya-prīteḥ kṣaṇikāyā mahā-narakānubandhinyāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:880: sakāśād indriyāṇi nivartayet tāvataiva ca brahmaṇi sthitir bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ //21 //
GE07bhg4c05u:882: sa ca bāhya-sparśeṣu viṣaya-sukheṣv asaktātmā anāsakta-manāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:883: tatra hetur ātmani jīvātmani paramātmānaṃ vindati sati prāpte yat sukhaṃ tad akṣayaṃ sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:885: na hi nirantaram amṛtāsvādine mṛttikā rocata iti bhāvaḥ //21//
GE07bhg4c05u:886: baladevaḥ : paurvauttaryeṇa sva-parātmānāv anubhavatīty āha bāhyeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:887: bāhya-sparśeṣu śabdādi-viṣayānubhaveṣu asaktātmā san yadātmani sva-svarūpe 'nubhūyamāne sukham tadādau vindati,
GE07bhg4c05u:888: tad uttaraṃ brahmaṇi paramātmani yogaḥ samādhis tad-yuktātmā san yad akṣayaṃ mahad-anubhava-lakṣaṇaṃ sukham tad aśnute labhate //21//
GE07bhg4c05u:890: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te /
GE07bhg4c05u:891: ādy-anta-vantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c05u:892: śrīdharaḥ : nanu priya-viṣaya-bhogānām api nivṛtteḥ kathaṃ mokṣaḥ puruṣārthaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:894: saṃsparśā viṣayās tebhyo jātā ye bhogāḥ sukhāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:895: te hi vartamāna-kāle 'pi spardhāsūyādi-vyāptatvād duḥkhasyaiva yonayaḥ kāraṇa-bhūtāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:899: nanu bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttāv ātmany akṣaya-sukhānubhavas tasmiṃś ca sati tat-prasādād
GE07bhg4c05u:900: eva bāhya-viṣaya-prīti-nivṛttir itītaretarāśraya-vaśān naikam api sidhyed ity āśaṅkya
GE07bhg4c05u:901: viṣaya-doṣa-darśanābhyāsenaiva tat-prīti-nivṛttir bhavatīti parihāram āha ye hīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:902: hi yasmād ye saṃsparśajā viṣayendriya-sambandha-jā bhogāḥ kṣudra-sukha-lavānubhavā iha vā paratra vā rāga-dveṣādi-vyāptatvena duḥkha-yonaya eva te /
GE07bhg4c05u:905: yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ saṃbandhān manasaḥ priyān /
GE07bhg4c05u:907: etādṛśā aḸ na sthirāḥ kintu ādy-anta-vantaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:908: ādir viṣayendriya-saṃyogo 'ntaś ca tad-viyoga evaṃ tau vidyete yeṣāṃ te pūrvāparayor asattvān madhye svapnavad āvirbhūtāḥ kṣaṇikā mithyā-bhūtāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:909: tad uktaṃ gauḍapādācāryaiḥ - ādāv ante ca yat tv asti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:910: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt teṣu budho vivekī na ramate pratikūla-vedanīyatvāc ca prītim anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:911: tad uktaṃ bhagavatā patañjalinā pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkhair guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ [YogS 2.15] iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:912: sarvam api viṣaya-sukhaṃ dṛṣṭam ānuśravikaṃ ca duḥkham eva pratikūla-vedanīyatvāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:914: akṣi-pātra-kalpo hi vidvān atyalpa-duḥkha-leśenāpy udvijate yathorṇa-tantur atisukumāro
GE07bhg4c05u:915: 'py akṣi-pātre nyastaḥ sparśena duḥkhayati netareṣv aṅgeṣu tadvad vivekina eva madhu-viṣa-saṃpṛktānna-bhojanavat
GE07bhg4c05u:916: sarvam api bhoga-sādhanaṃ kāla-traye 'pi kleśānubiddhatvād duḥkhaṃ na mūḍhasya bahuvidha-duḥkha-sahiṣṇor ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:920: tatra pariṇāmaś ca tāpaś ca saṃskāraś ca ta eva duḥkhāni tair ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:922: tathā hi - rāgānubiddha eva sarvo 'pi sukhānubhavaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:923: na hi tatra na rajyati tena sukhī ceti sambhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:924: rāga eva ca pūrvam udbhūtaḥ san viṣaya-prāptyā sukha-rūpeṇa pariṇamate /
GE07bhg4c05u:926: yā hi bhogeṣv indriyāṇām upaśāntiḥ paritṛptatvāt tat sukham /
GE07bhg4c05u:928: na cendriyāṇāṃ bhogābhyāsena vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kartuṃ śakyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:929: yato bhogābhyāsam anu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇāṃ / smṛtiś ca -
GE07bhg4c05u:930: na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati /
GE07bhg4c05u:932: tasmād duḥkhātmaka-rāga-pariṇāmatvād viṣaya-sukham api duḥkham eva kārya-kāraṇayor abhedād iti pariṇāma-duḥkhatvam /
GE07bhg4c05u:934: nānupahatya bhūtāny upabhogaḥ sambhavatīti bhūtāni ca hinasti /
GE07bhg4c05u:935: dveṣaś ca sarvāṇi duḥkha-sādhanāni me mā bhūvann iti saṅkalpa-viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:936: na ca tāni sarvāṇi kaścid api parihartuṃ śaknoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:937: ataḥ sukhānubhava-kāle 'pi tat-paripanthinaṃ prati dveṣasya sarvadaivāvasthitatvāt tāpa-duḥkhaṃ duṣparihāram eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:939: evaṃ duḥkha-sādhanāni parihartum aśakto muhyati ceti moha-duḥkhatāpi vyākhyeyā /
GE07bhg4c05u:940: tathā coktaṃ yoga-bhāṣya-kāraiḥ - sarvasya dveṣānubiddhaś cetanācetana-sādhanādhīnas tāpānubhava iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:942: sukha-sādhanāni ca prārthayamānaḥ kāyena vācā manasā ca parispandate /
GE07bhg4c05u:943: tataḥ param anugṛṇāty upahanti ceti parānuraha-pīḍābhyāṃ dharmādharmāv
GE07bhg4c05u:944: upacinoti / na karmāśayo lobhān mohāc ca bhavati ity eṣā tāpa-duḥkhatocyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:945: tathā vartamānaḥ sukhānubhavaḥ sva-vināśa-kāle saṃskāram ādhatte /
GE07bhg4c05u:952: evaṃ kāla-traye 'pi duḥkhānuvedhād viṣaya-sukhaṃ duḥkham evety uktvā svarūpato 'pi duḥkhatām āha guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:954: taila-varty-agnaya iva dīpaṃ puruṣa-bhogopayuktatvena try-ātmakam ekaṃ kāryam ārabhante
GE07bhg4c05u:955: tatraikasya prādhānye dvayor guṇa-bhāvāt pradhāna-mātra-vyapadeśena sāttvikaṃ rājasaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:956: tāmasam iti triguṇam api kāryam ekena guṇena vyapadiśyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:957: tatra sukhopabhoga-rūpo 'pi pratyaya udbhūta-sattva-kāryatve 'py anudbhūta-rajas-tamaḥ-kāryatvāt triguṇātmaka eva /
GE07bhg4c05u:958: tathā ca sukhātmakatvavad duḥkhātmakatvaṃ viṣādātmakatvaṃ ca tasya dhruvam iti duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:960: yasmāc calaṃ ca guṇa-vṛttam iti kṣipra-pariṇāmi cittam uktam /
GE07bhg4c05u:961: nanv ekaḥ pratyayaḥ kathaṃ paraspara-viruddha-sukha-duḥkha-mohatvāny ekadā pratipadyata iti cet, na /
GE07bhg4c05u:963: sama-vṛttikānām eva hi guṇānāṃ yugapad virodho na viṣama-vṛttikānām /
GE07bhg4c05u:964: yathā dharma-jñāna-vairāgyaiśvaryāṇi labdha-vṛttikāni labdha-vṛttikair evādharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśvaryaiḥ saha virudhyante na tu svarūpa-sadbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:965: pradhānasya pradhānena saha virodho na tu durbaleneti hi nyāyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:966: evaṃ sattva-rajas-tamāṃsy api parasparaṃ prādhānya-mātraṃ yugapan na sahante na tu sad-bhāvam api /
GE07bhg4c05u:967: etena pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkheṣv api rāga-dveṣa-mohānāṃ yugapat sad-bhāvo vyākhyātaḥ prasupta-tanu-vicchinnodāra-rūpeṇa kleśānāṃ catur-avasthatvāt
GE07bhg4c05u:978: sati mūle tad-vipāko jātyāyur bhogāḥ [YogS 2.3-13] iti pātañjalāni sūtrāṇi /
GE07bhg4c05u:979: tatrātasmiṃs tad-buddhir viparyayo mithyā-jñānam avidyeti paryāyāḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:981: tatrānitye nitya-buddhir yathā - dhruvā pṛthivī dhruvā sa-candra-tārakā dyaur amṛtā divaukasa iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:982: aśucau parama-bībhatse kāye śuci-buddhir yathā naveva śaśāṅkalekhā kamanīyeyaṃ kanyā
GE07bhg4c05u:983: madhv-amṛtāvayava-nirmiteva candraṃ bhittvā niḥsṛteva jñāyate nīlotpala-patrāyatākṣī
GE07bhg4c05u:984: hāvagarbhābhyāṃ locanābhyāṃ jīva-lokam āśvāsayatīveti kasya kena sambandhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:991: duḥkhe sukha-khyātir udāhṛtā pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkhair guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekina iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:992: anātmany ātma-khyātir yathā śarīre manuṣyo 'ham ity ādiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:993: iyaṃ cāvidyā sarva-kleśa-mūla-bhūtā tama ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:995: sādhana-rahitasyāpi sarvaṃ sukha-jātīyaṃ me bhūyād iti viparyaya-viśeṣo rāgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:997: duḥkha-sādhane vidyamāne 'pi kim api duḥkham me mā bhūd iti viparyaya-viśeṣo dveṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:999: āyur-abhāve 'py etaiḥ śarīrendriyādibhir anityair api viyogo me mā bhūd ity āvidvad-aṅganā-bālaṃ svābhāvikaḥ sarva-prāṇi-sādhāraṇo maraṇa-trāsa-rūpo viparyaya-viśeṣo 'bhiniveśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1002: tamo moho mahā-mohas tāmisro hy andha-saṃjñitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1004: ete ca kleśāś catur avasthā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1009: etādṛg avasthā-catuṣṭaya-viśiṣṭānām asmitādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ viparyaya-rūpāṇāṃ kleśānām avidyaiva sāmānya-rūpā kṣetraṃ prasava-bhūmiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1012: te ca kleśāḥ prasuptā yathā prakṛti-līnānāṃ,
GE07bhg4c05u:1014: ta ubhaye 'pi sūkṣmāḥ pratiprasavena mano-nirodhenaiva nirbīja-samādhinā heyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1016: tat-kārya-bhūtāḥ sthūlā vicchinnā udāhārāś ca vicchidya vicchidya tena tenātmanā punaḥ prādurbhavantīti vicchinnāḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1017: yathā rāga-kāle krodho vidyamāno 'pi na prādurbhūta iti vicchinna ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1018: evam ekasyāṃ striyāṃ caitro rakta iti nānyāsu viraktaḥ kintv ekasyāṃ rāgo labdha-vṛttir anyāsu ca bhaviṣyad-vṛttir iti sa tadā vicchinna ucyate,
GE07bhg4c05u:1019: ye yadā viṣayeṣu labdha-vṛttayas te tadā sarvātmanā prādurbhūtā udārā ucyante,
GE07bhg4c05u:1020: ta ubhaye 'py atisthūlatvāc chuddha-sattva-bhavena bhagavad-dhyānena heyā na mano-niodham apekṣante /
GE07bhg4c05u:1022: tathā ca pariṇāma-tāpa-saṃskāra-duḥkheṣu prasupta-tanu-vicchinna-rūpeṇa sarve kleśāḥ sarvadā santi /
GE07bhg4c05u:1023: udāratā tu kadācit kasyacid iti viśeṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1024: ete ca bādhanā-lakṣaṇaṃ duḥkham upajanayantaḥ kleśa-śabda-vācyā bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1027: sati ca mūla-bhūte kleśe tasya karmāśayasya vipākaḥ phalaṃ janmāyur bhogaś ceti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1028: sa ca karmāśaya iha paratra ca sva-vipākārambhakatvena dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-janma-vedanīyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1030: ataḥ samīcīnam uktaṃ ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkha-yonaya eva te ādyantavanta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1031: duḥkha-yonitvaṃ pariṇāmādibhir guṇa-vṛtti-virodhāc ca ādyantavattvaṃ guṇa-vṛttasya calatvād iti yoga-mate vyākhyā /
GE07bhg4c05u:1032: aupaniṣadānāṃ tu anādi bhāva-rūpam ajñānam avidyā /
GE07bhg4c05u:1034: rāga-dveṣābhiniveśās tad-vṛtti-viśeṣā ity avidyā-mūlatvāt sarve 'py avidyātmakatvena
GE07bhg4c05u:1035: mithyā-bhūtā rajju-bhujaṅgādhyāsavan mithyātve 'pi duḥkha-yonayaḥ svapnādivad dṛṣṭi-sṛṣṭi-mātratvenādyantavantaś
GE07bhg4c05u:1036: ceti budho 'dhiṣṭhāna-sākṣātkāreṇa nivṛtta-bhramas teṣu na ramate,
GE07bhg4c05u:1038: na saṃsāre sukhasya gandha-mātram apy astīti buddhvā tataḥ sarvāṇīndriyāṇi nivartayed ity arthaḥ //22//
GE07bhg4c05u:1040: vivekavān eva vastuto viṣaya-sukhenaiva sajjatīty āha ye hīti //22//
GE07bhg4c05u:1041: baladevaḥ : adṛṣṭākṛṣṭeṣu viṣaya-bhogeṣv anityatva-viniścayān na sajjatīty āha ye hīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1046: kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c05u:1047: śrīdharaḥ : yasmān mokṣa eva paramaḥ puruṣārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1049: atas tat-sahana-samartha eva mokṣa-bhāg ity āha śaknotīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1050: kāmāt kordhāc codbhavati yo vego mano-netrādi-kṣobhādi-lakṣaṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1051: tam ihaiva tad-uttara-samaya eva yo naraḥ soḍhuṃ pratiroddhuṃ śaknoti,
GE07bhg4c05u:1055: ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa eva yuktaḥ samāhitaḥ sukhī ca bhavati /
GE07bhg4c05u:1057: yad vā maraṇād ūrdhvaṃ vilapantībhir yuvatībhir āliṅgyamāno 'pi putrādibhir dahyamāno
GE07bhg4c05u:1058: 'pi yathā prāṇa-śūnyaḥ kāma-krodha-vegaṃ sahate tathā maraṇāt prāg api jīvann eva
GE07bhg4c05u:1059: yaḥ sahate sa eva yuktaḥ sukhī cety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1061: prāṇe gate yathā dehaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na vindati /
GE07bhg4c05u:1062: tathā cet prāṇa-yukto 'pi sa kaivalyāśrayo bhavet // iti //23//
GE07bhg4c05u:1064: sarvānartha-prāpti-hetur durnivāro 'yaṃ śreyo-mārga-pratipakṣaḥ kaṣṭatamo doṣo mahatā yatnena mumukṣuṇā nivāraṇīya iti yatnādhikya-vidhānāya punar āha śaknotīti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1065: ātmano 'nukūleṣu sukha-hetuṣu dṛśyamāneṣu smaryamāṇeṣu vā tad-guṇānusandhānābhyāsena yo raty-ātmako gardho 'bhilāṣas tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ sa kāmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1067: etad-abhilāṣeṇa kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobha ity atra dhana-tṛṣṇā lobhaḥ strī-vyatikara-tṛṣṇā kāma iti kāma-lobhau pṛthag uktau /
GE07bhg4c05u:1068: iha tu tṛṣṇā-sāmānyābhiprāyeṇa kāma-śabdaḥ prayukta iti lobhaḥ pṛthaṅ noktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1069: evam ātmanaḥ pratikūleṣu duḥkha-hetuṣu dṛśyamāneṣu śrūyamāṇeṣu vā tad-doṣānusandhānābhyāsena
GE07bhg4c05u:1071: tayor utkaṭāvasthā loka-veda-virodha-pratisandhāna-pratibandhakatayā loka-veda-viruddha-pravṛtty-unmukhatva-rūpā nadī-vega-sāmyena vega ity ucyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1072: yathā hi nadyā vego varṣāsv atiprabalatayā loka-veda-virodha-pratisandhānenānicchantam api garte pātayitvā majjayati cādho nayati ca,
GE07bhg4c05u:1075: majjayati cādho mahā-narakān nayati ceti vega-pada-prayogeṇa sūcitam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1076: etac cātha kena prayukto 'yam ity atra nivṛttam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1077: tam etādṛśaṃ kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegam antaḥkaraṇa-prakṣobha-rūpaṃ stambha-svedādy-aneka-bāhya-vikāra-liṅgam
GE07bhg4c05u:1084: tad-itaras tv āhāra-nidrā-bhaya-maithunādi-paśu-dharma-mātra-ratatvena manuṣyākāraḥ paśur eveti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1085: ā-śarīra-vimokṣaṇād ity atrānyad vyākhyānam - yathā maraṇād ūrdhvaṃ vilapantībhir yuvatībhir āliṅgyamāno 'pi putrādibhir dahyamāno 'pi prāṇa-śūnyatvāt kāma-krodha-vegaṃ sahate,
GE07bhg4c05u:1086: tathā maraṇāt prāg api jīvann eva yaḥ sahate sa yukta ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c05u:1087: atra yadi maraṇavaj jīvane 'pi kāma-krodhānutpatti-mātraṃ brūyāt tadaitad yujyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1089: prāṇe gate yathā dehaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ na vindati /
GE07bhg4c05u:1090: tathā cet prāṇa-yukto 'pi sa kaivalyāśrame vaset // iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1091: iha tūpannayoḥ kāma-krodhayor vega-sahane prastute tayor anutpatti-mātraṃ na dārṣṭānta iti kim atinirbandhena //23//
GE07bhg4c05u:1093: saṃsāra-sindhau patito 'py eṣa eva yogī eṣa eva sukhīty āha śaknotīti //23//
GE07bhg4c05u:1094: baladevaḥ : śaknotīhaiva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prāk śarīra-vimokṣaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:1095: kāma-krodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ //23//
GE07bhg4c05u:1099: śrīdhara : na kevalaṃ kāma-krodha-vega-saṃharaṇa-mātreṇa mokṣaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1103: antar evārāma ākrīḍā yasya na bahiḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1106: sa evaṃ brahmaṇi bhūtaḥ sthitaḥ san brahmaṇi nirvāṇaṃ layam adhigacchati prāpnoti //24//
GE07bhg4c05u:1110: antar-bāhya-viṣaya-nirapekṣam eva svarūpa-bhūtaṃ sukhaṃ yasya so 'ntaḥ-sukho bāhya-viṣaya-janita-sukha-śūnya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1111: kuto bāhya-sukhābhāvas tatrāha antar ātmany eva na tu stry-ādi-viṣaye bāhya-sukha-sādhana
GE07bhg4c05u:1112: ārāma āramaṇaṃ krīḍā yasya so 'ntar-ārāmas tyakta-sarva-parigrahatvena bāhya-sukha-sādhana-śūnya ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1115: grāmyaiḥ sukhotpatti-sambhavāt kathaṃ bāhya-sukha-tat-sādhana-śūnyatvam iti tatrāha
GE07bhg4c05u:1117: yathāntar eva sukhaṃ na bāhyair viṣayais tathāntar evātmani jyotir vijñānaṃ na bāhyair indriyair yasya so 'ntar-jyotiḥ śrotrādi-janya-śabdādi-viṣaya-vijñāna-rahitaḥ
GE07bhg4c05u:1119: samādhi-kāle śabdādi-pratibhāsābhāvād vyutthāna-kāle tat-pratibhāse 'pi mithyātva-niścayān na bāhya-viṣayais tasya sukhotpatti-sambhava ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1120: ya evaṃ yathokta-viśeṣaṇa-sampannaḥ sa yogī samāhito brahma-nirvāṇaṃ brahma paramānanda-rūpaṃ kalpita-dvaitopaśama-rūpatvena nirvāṇaṃ tad eva,
GE07bhg4c05u:1124: brahmaiva san brahmāpy eti iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1125: avasthiter iti kāśa-kṛtsnaḥ iti nyāyāc ca //24//
GE07bhg4c05u:1126: viśvanātha - yas tu saṃsārātītas tasya tu brahmānubhava eva sukham ity āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1129: ato 'ntarātmany eva jyotir dṛṣṭir yasya saḥ //24//
GE07bhg4c05u:1130: baladeva - yat prītyā taṃ soḍhuṃ śaktas tad āha yo 'ntar iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1133: tasminn eva jyotir dṛṣṭir yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1134: īdṛśo yogī niṣkāma-karmī brahma-bhūto labdha-śuddha-jaiva-svarūpo brahmādhigacchati paramātmānaṃ labhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1145: mukti-hetor jñānasya sādhanāntarāṇi vivṛṇvann āha labhanta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1150: etādṛśāś ca dvaitādarśitvena sarva-bhūta-hite ratā hiṃsā-śūnyā brahma-vido brahma-nirvāṇaṃ labhante /
GE07bhg4c05u:1152: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ // iti śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1156: evaṃ bahava eva sādhana-siddhā bhavantīty āha labhanta iti //25//
GE07bhg4c05u:1157: baladevaḥ : evaṃ sādhana-siddhā bahava bhavantīty āha labhanta iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1167: saṃyata-cittānāṃ jñātātma-tattvānām abhita ubhayato jīvatāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c05u:1168: na dehānta eva teṣāṃ brahmaṇi layaḥ,
GE07bhg4c05u:1169: api tu jīvatām api vartata ity arthaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c05u:1171: pūrvaṃ kāma-krodhayor utpannayor api vegaḥ soḍhavya ity uktam adhunā tu tayor utpatti-pratibandha eva kartavya ity āha kāmeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1172: kāma-krodhayor viyogas tad-anutpattir eva tad-yuktānāṃ kāma-krodha-viyuktānām /
GE07bhg4c05u:1173: ataeva yata-cetasāṃ saṃyata-cittānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatna-śīlānāṃ saṃnyāsināṃ viditātmanāṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1174: sākṣāt-kṛta-paramātmanām abhita ubhayato jīvatāṃ mṛtānāṃ ca teṣāṃ brahma-nirvāṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1178: jñātas tvaṃ-padārtha-nāma-prāpta-paramātma-jñānānāṃ kiyatā kālena brahma-nirvāṇa-sukhaṃ syād ity apekṣāyām āha kāmeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1180: abhitaḥ sarvato-bhāvenaiva vartata eveti brahma-nirvāṇe tasya naivātivilambam iti bhāvaḥ //26//
GE07bhg4c05u:1181: baladevaḥ : īdṛśān paramātmāpy anuvartata ity āha kāmeti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1182: yatīnāṃ prayatnavatāṃ tān abhito brahma vartata ity arthaḥ / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c05u:1184: svāny apatyāni puṣṇanti tathāham api padmaja // iti //26//
GE07bhg4c05u:1186: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1189: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ //28//
GE07bhg4c05u:1190: śrīdharaḥ : sa yogī brahma-nirvāṇam ity ādiṣu yogī mokṣam avāpnotīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1191: tam eva yogaṃ saṅkṣepeṇāha sparśān iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c05u:1192: bāhyā eva sparśā rūpa-rasādayo viṣayāś cintitāḥ santo 'ntaḥ praviśanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1194: cakṣur bhruvor antare bhrū-madhya eva kṛtvātyantaṃ netrayor nimīlane hi nidrayā mano līyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1196: tad-ubhaya-doṣa-parihārārtham ardha-nimīlanena bhrū-madhye dṛṣṭiṃ nidhāyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1197: ucchvāsa-niḥśvāsa-rūpeṇa nāsikayor abhyantare carantau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-rodhena samau kṛtvā,
GE07bhg4c05u:1199: yad vā prāṇo 'yaṃ yathā na bhair niryāti yathā cāpāno 'ntar na praviśati,
GE07bhg4c05u:1200: kintu nāsā-madhya eva dvāv api yathā caratas tathā mandābhyām ucchvāsa-niḥśvāsābhyāṃ samau
GE07bhg4c05u:1202: yateti / anenopāyena yatāḥ saṃyatā indriya-mano-buddhayo yasya /
GE07bhg4c05u:1203: mokṣa eva param ayanaṃ prāpyaṃ yasya /
GE07bhg4c05u:1205: evaṃbhūto yo muniḥ sa sadā jīvann api mukta evety arthaḥ //27-28//
GE07bhg4c05u:1207: pūrvam īśvarārpita-sarva-bhāvasya karma-yogenāntaḥ-karaṇa-śuddhis tataḥ sarva-karma-saṃnyāsas tataḥ śravaṇādi-parasya tattva-jñānaṃ mokṣa-sādhanam udetīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1208: adhunā sa yogī brahma-nirvāṇam ity atra sūcitaṃ dhyāna-yogaṃ samyag-darśana-syāntaraṅga-sādhanaṃ vistareṇa vaktuṃ sūtra-sthānīyāṃs trīn ślokān āha bhagavān /
GE07bhg4c05u:1209: eteṣām eva vṛtti-sthānīyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ ṣaṣṭho 'dhyāyo bhaviṣyati /
GE07bhg4c05u:1211: tṛtīyena tu tat-phalaṃ paramātma-jñānam iti vivekaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1212: sparśān śabdādīn bāhyān bahir bhavān api śrotrādi-dvārā tat-tad-ākārāntaḥ-karaṇa-vṛttibhir
GE07bhg4c05u:1213: antaḥ-praviṣṭān punar bahir eva kṛtvā para-vairāgya-vaśena tat-tad-ākārāṃ vṛttim
GE07bhg4c05u:1215: yady eta āntarā bhaveyus tadopāya-sahasreṇāpi bahir na syuḥ svabhāva-bhaṅga-prasaṅgāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:1216: bāhyānāṃ tu rāga-vaśād antaḥ-praviṣṭānāṃ vairāgyeṇa bahir gamanaṃ sambhavatīti vadituṃ bāhyān iti viśeṣaṇam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1217: tad anena vairāgyam uktvābhyāsam āha cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ kṛtvety anuṣajyate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1218: atyanta-nimīlane hi nidrākhyā layātmikā vṛttir ekā bhavet /
GE07bhg4c05u:1219: prasāreṇa tu pramāṇa-viparyaya-viveka-vikalpa-smṛtayaś catasro vikṣepātmikā vṛttayo bhaveyuḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1220: pañcāpi tu vṛttayo niroddhavyā iti ardha-nimīlanena bhrū-madhye cakṣuṣo nidhānam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1223: anenopāyena yatāḥ saṃyatā indriya-mano-buddhayo yasya sa tathā /
GE07bhg4c05u:1225: vigatecchā-bhaya-krodha iti vīrta-rāga-bhaya-krodha ity atra vyākhyātam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1226: etādṛśo yaḥ saṃnyāsī sadā bhavati mukta eva saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1228: athavā ya etādṛśaḥ sa sadā jīvann api mukta eva //27-28//
GE07bhg4c05u:1234: idānīṃ niṣkāma-karma-yogena śuddhāntaḥkaraṇasyāṣṭāṅga-yogaṃ brahmānubhava-sādhanaṃ jñāna-yogād apy utkṛṣṭatvena ṣaṣṭhādhyāye vaktuṃ tat-sūtra-rūpaṃ śloka-trayam āha sparśān iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1237: tasmān manasaḥ sakāśād bahiṣkṛtya viṣayebhyo manaḥ pratyāhṛtyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1238: cakṣuṣī ca bhruvor antare madhye kṭvā netrayoḥ sampūrṇa-nimīlane nidrayā mano līyata unmīlanena bahiḥ prasarati /
GE07bhg4c05u:1240: bhrū-madhye dṛṣṭiṃ nidhāyocchvāsa-niśvāsa-rūpeṇa nāsikayor abhyantare carantau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-nirodhena samau kṛtvā /
GE07bhg4c05u:1242: baladevaḥ : atha karmaṇā niṣkāmeṇa viśuddha-manāḥ samuditātma-jñānas tad-darśanāya samādhiṃ kuryād iti sāṅgaṃ yogaṃ sūcayann āha sparśān iti
GE07bhg4c05u:1243: sparśā śabdādayo viṣayās te bāhyā eva smṛtāḥ santo manasi praviśanti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1244: tāṃs tat-smṛti-parityāgena bahiṣkṛtya viṣayebhyo manaḥ pratyāhṛtyety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1245: bhruvor antare madhye cakṣuś ca kṭvā netrayoḥ saṃnimīlane nidrayā manaso layaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1246: pronmīlane ca bahis tasya prasāraḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:1248: tathā nāsābhyantara-cāriṇau prāṇāpānāv ūrdhvādho-gati-nirodhena samau tulyau kṛtvā kumbhayitvety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1249: etenopāyena yatā ātmāvalokanāya sthāpitā indriyādayo yena saḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1253: / īdṛśo yaḥ sarvadā phala-kālavat sādhana-kāle 'pi mukta eva //27-28//
GE07bhg4c05u:1256: suhṛdaṃ sarva-bhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati //29//
GE07bhg4c05u:1257: śrīdharaḥ : nanv evam indriyādi-saṃyamana-mātreṇa kathaṃ muktiḥ syāt ?
GE07bhg4c05u:1260: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva mama bhaktaiḥ samarpitānāṃ yadṛcchayā bhoktāraṃ pālakam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c05u:1263: antaryāmiṇaṃ māṃ jñātvā mat-prasādena śāntiṃ mokṣam ṛcchati prāpnoti //29//
GE07bhg4c05u:1265: samuccayaḥ krameṇoktaḥ sarvajñaṃ naumi taṃ harim //
GE07bhg4c05u:1269: evaṃ yoga-yuktaḥ kiṃ jñātvā mucyata iti tadāha bhoktāram iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1270: sarveṣāṃ yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ ca kartṛ-rūpeṇa devatā-rūpeṇa ca bhoktāraṃ bhoga-kartāraṃ pālakam iti vā /
GE07bhg4c05u:1272: sarveṣāṃ lokānāṃ mahāntam īśvaraṃ hiraṇyagarbhādīnām api niyantāram /
GE07bhg4c05u:1273: sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ suhṛdaṃ pratyupakāra-nirapekṣatayopakāriṇaṃ sarvāntgaryāmiṇaṃ sarva-bhāsakaṃ
GE07bhg4c05u:1274: paripūrṇa-sac-cid-ānanadaika-rasaṃ paramārtha-satyaṃ sarvātmānaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ māṃ jñātvātmatvena
GE07bhg4c05u:1275: sākṣātkṛtya śāntiṃ sarva-saṃsāroparatiṃ muktim ṛcchati prāpnotīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c05u:1276: tvāṃ paśyann api kathaṃ nāhaṃ mukta ity āśaṅkyānirākaraṇāya viśeṣaṇāni /
GE07bhg4c05u:1277: ukta-rūpeṇaiva mama jñānaṃ mukti-kāraṇam iti bhāvaḥ //29//
GE07bhg4c05u:1284: evambhūtasya yogino 'pi jñānina iva bhakty-utthena paramātma-jñānenaiva mokṣa ity āha bhoktāram iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1285: yajñānāṃ karmi-kṛtānāṃ tapasāṃ ca jñāni-kṛtānāṃ bhoktāraṃ pālayitāram iti karmiṇāṃ jñānināṃ copāsyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1286: sarva-lokānāṃ maheśvaraṃ mahā-niyantāram antaryāminaṃ yoginām upāsyam /
GE07bhg4c05u:1287: sarva-bhūtānāṃ suhṛdaṃ kṛpayā sva-bhakta-dvārā sva-bhakty-upadeśena hita-kāriṇam
GE07bhg4c05u:1288: iti bhaktānām upāsyaṃ māṃ jñātveti sattva-guṇa-maya-jñānena nirguṇasya mamānubhavāsambhavāt
GE07bhg4c05u:1290: nirguṇayā bhaktyaiva yogī svopāsyaṃ paramātmānaṃ mām aparokṣānubhava-gocarīkṛtya śāntiṃ mokṣam ṛcchati prāpnoti //29//
GE07bhg4c05u:1295: baladevaḥ : evaṃ samādhi-sthaḥ kṛta-svātmāvalokanaḥ paramātmānam upāsyam ucyata ity āha bhoktāram iti /
GE07bhg4c05u:1298: tam īśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ [ŚvetU 6.7] ity ādi śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c05u:1300: īdṛśaṃ māṃ jñātvā svārādhyatayānubhūya śāntiṃ saṃsāra-nivṛttim ṛcchati labhate /
GE07bhg4c05u:1301: sarveśvarasya suhṛdaś ca samārādhanaṃ khalu sukhāvahaṃ sukha-sādhanam iti //29//
